document_data.name: A Merchant's Musings
document_data.author: [[Donstable Hroun]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Merchant's Musings''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Donstable Hroun]], the Master Merchant of [[Tsurlagol]] in [[the Vast]], in [[1355 DR]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

A copy was kept in the great fortress-library of [[Candlekeep]] around [[1372 DR]].
